ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tpstop.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_istps2 | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( J e. Top /\ ( Base ` K ) = U. J ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simplbi | |- ( K e. TopSp -> J e. Top ) |
